title: Willmaw The Brother of Vilemaw
body:
I´m a big fan of Vilemaw so I wanted to make a champ that looks like him.

THIS IS THE BIRTH OF VILEMAWS TWIN WILLMAW

So he should look like this.
http://imgur.com/DQ35u2t

So Willmaws Abilities are similar like Vilemaws but different.
I wanted Willmaw to be a pusher like champion that scales with AD and AP.

Passive
 TOO SPOOKY: Every time Willmaw kills a minion the nearest two minions will be                                      
                        feared for 1.5 seconds

 First Abilitie
   SPIDERWEB: Willmaw throws out a web and pulls all enemies in front of him
                          and apply a slow for 1 second
                          Range: 550    Cooldown: 14/13/12/10/9 Seconds

                          Slow: 20%  Damage: 40/50/65/80/95 (+40% AP scaling)

Second Abilitie
SPIDERLINGS: Willmaw throws three spidereggs at a target. If the target dies, three    
                         spiderlings will spawn.
                         Range: 650    Cooldown 12/12/12/12/12 Seconds
                         Spiderling: Damage 10/15/20/30/40 (+ 10% AD scaling)
                                            Health    60/65/70/80/95 (+ 10% HP scaling)
                                            

Third Abilitie
GROUNDSLAM: Wilmaw slams the ground with his claws dealing huge amounts of                              
                           damge and stuns the enemy for 1 second.
                          Range: 300   Cooldown: 8/7/6/5/4 Seconds
                       Damage: 60/70/ 85/ 100/120 (+ 40% AD scaling 40% AP scaling)
                 
Ultimate Abilite
    AIRTHROW: Willmaw digs himself into the ground and comes at a targeted   
                        location dealing huge damage and knocking up all enemies for 2 
                        seconds.
                        Range: 700  AoE range: 350 Cooldown: 120/100/80 seconds
                        Damage: 250/320/400 (+ 80% AP scaling)

replies.body: Jo wenn dieser Champ bald nicht realesd wird dann weiß ich es auch nicht {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
wer ist vielmaw und geht das auf deutsch ?
Vielmaw ist dieses baronähnliche Camp auf der 3 vs 3 map
